title: Heart of Wicker Park 1 Bedroom Apt
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Live near all the Wicker Park action on a quiet tree and garden lined street with easy street parking.
The 1 bedroom high 1st floor apartment is spotless, well maintained, with a large back porch overlooking a fragrant flower garden.
Victorian 3 flat has vintage charm with modern amenities and is owner occupied.
Building is just blocks from fantastic restaurants, clubs, theater, and shops.
Near the 606 park and the Damen/Milwaukee Blue line stop is 3-4 blocks away.
Living room, formal dining room, and galley kitchen with separate undercounter fridge and freezer.
Bedroom is long and narrow (12' x 7').
Features: Large windows, hardwood wood floors, central air and heat, mini-blinds, and shared laundry.
Tenants have use of their own porch, backyard flower garden, charcoal grill and dining set.
